name: Snowman Hands: Lucky Mitts
description: Hands covered by two red mittens. Can be used to build a Puffy Snowman.\nMondstadt's children believe that wearing red gloves during the winter will bring them good luck in the coming year. As avatars of winter, snowmen clad thusly in red mittens are said to be capable of spreading this good fortune to those who build snowmen together with you.
